item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 south west corner o, 16th July
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 south west corner of Park Hall Road (ie BT phone exchange corner) junction yellow plastic grit bin multi tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com report to your contractor for pictures and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4355865,-0.0937613,3a,33.2y,197.17h,80.83t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sZnyXdSOJHS5rhyuhaLUr-g!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D9.172401253959833%26panoid%3DZnyXdSOJHS5rhyuhaLUr-g%26yaw%3D197.16740632622506!7i16384!8i8192?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDcxMy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Hall Road, West Norwood, London

item.title: Along my Rd still not swept correctly or properly or been done at all., 16th July
item.description:
Feedback@haringey.gov.uk Today's date is the 16th of July, 2025. Rochelle Cassell Feedback & Resolutions Officer Feedback & Resolutions Team Today's date is the 16th of July 2025. Hi from Mr Webster. 5th e-mail about the same problem. No help from Harringay Council. Another copy to fix my street. flashing outside on top of a easement / conjoining porch the property at #41 which is next door to me has the same problem going on because it is conjoined and it's going to need urgent attention very soon because it's letting in water

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dorset Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking on yellow line and blocking entrance to private road, 16th July
item.description:
This coach is permanently parked on the yellow line on oaks Lane, Newbury Park, Ilford Essex IG2 7PL. It's also blocking the entrance to the private road. It's been there for about 7 weeks. I believe it belongs to the person who lives at 2a oaks Lane, Newbury Park. He owns many ice cream vans, a couple of cars and vans and a caravan, some of which are permanently parked on the private road. Nobody else is allowed access. He never gets a ticket for the coach when the yellow 3is in force although other cars in that immediate area will get a ticket. Action needs to be taken on this matter

Report on FixMyStreet
